</article>

tree.title: atom/link

usedBy.description: Expands a link to make it full-width.

context.name: link-expand

variable.description: Default fill for links. Can either be `solid` or `hollow`.
Background color on hover for links.

usedBy.description: Sets the visual style of a link.

context.name: link-style

usedBy.description: Adds disabled styles to a link by fading the element, reseting the cursor, and disabling pointer events.

context.name: link-disabled

usedBy.description: Sets the visual style of a link.

context.name: link-style

usedBy.description: Adds disabled styles to a link by fading the element, reseting the cursor, and disabling pointer events.

context.name: link-disabled

variable.description: Border radius for links, defaulted to global-radius.
Border width for hollow outline links
Coloring classes. A map of classes to output in your CSS, like `.secondary`, `.success`, and so on.

usedBy.description: Adds disabled styles to a link by fading the element, reseting the cursor, and disabling pointer events.

context.name: link-disabled

variable.description: Background color lightness on hover for links.
Color lightness on hover for hollow links.

mixin.description: Expands a link to make it full-width.

context.name: link-expand

parameter.name: expand
parameter.description: Set to `true` to enable the expand behavior. Set to `false` to reverse this behavior.

usedBy.description: Adds all styles for a link. For more granular control over styles, use the individual link mixins.

context.name: link

mixin.description: Sets the visual style of a link.

context.name: link-style

parameter.name: background-hover
parameter.description: Background color of the link on hover. Set to `auto` to have the mixin automatically generate a hover color.

parameter.name: color
parameter.description: Text color of the link. Set to `auto` to automatically generate a color based on the background color.

usedBy.description: Adds all styles for a link. For more granular control over styles, use the individual link mixins.

context.name: link

mixin.description: Removes background fill on hover and focus for hollow links.

usedBy.description: Adds all styles for a link. For more granular control over styles, use the individual link mixins.

context.name: link

mixin.description: Adds disabled styles to a link by fading the element, reseting the cursor, and disabling pointer events.

context.name: link-disabled

mixin.description: Adds a dropdown arrow to a link.

context.name: link-dropdown

parameter.name: size
parameter.description: Size of the arrow. We recommend using an `em` value so the triangle scales when used inside different sizes of links.

parameter.name: offset
parameter.description: Distance between the arrow and the text of the link. Defaults to whatever the right padding of a link is.

mixin.description: Adds all styles for a link. For more granular control over styles, use the individual link mixins.

context.name: link

parameter.name: expand
parameter.description: Set to `true` to make the link full-width.

parameter.name: background-hover
parameter.description: Background color of the link on hover. Set to `auto` to have the mixin automatically generate a hover color.

parameter.name: color
parameter.description: Text color of the link. Set to `auto` to automatically generate a color based on the background color.

parameter.name: style
parameter.description: Set to `hollow` to create a hollow link. The color defined in `$background` will be used as the primary color of the link.

{{#unless headlevel}}

{{/if}}

tree.title: molecule/text-excerpt-toggle
tree.description: an inline text paragraph, toggling to excerpt or full length

class.comment:
/**
     * Creates a new instance of a Siteapp.TextExcerptToggle.
     * @class
     * @param {jQuery} element - jQuery object to make into a Siteapp.TextExcerptToggle.
     *        Object should be of the TextExcerptToggle panel, rather than its anchor.
     * @param {Object} options - Overrides to the default plugin settings.
     */
class.description: Creates a new instance of a Siteapp.TextExcerptToggle.

params.description:
jQuery object to make into a Siteapp.TextExcerptToggle.
       Object should be of the TextExcerptToggle panel, rather than its anchor.
params.name: element

params.description: Overrides to the default plugin settings.
params.name: options

class.name: TextExcerptToggle

function.comment:
/**
   * Helper function to determine current orientation of TextExcerptToggle pane.
   * @function
   * @returns {String} position - string value of a position class.
   */
function.description: Helper function to determine current orientation of TextExcerptToggle pane.

returns.description: position - string value of a position class.

function.name: getPositionClass

function.comment:
/**
   * Opens the TextExcerptToggle pane, and fires a bubbling event to close other TextExcerptToggle.
   * @function
   * @fires TextExcerptToggle#closeme
   * @fires TextExcerptToggle#show
   */
function.description: Opens the TextExcerptToggle pane, and fires a bubbling event to close other TextExcerptToggle.
function.name: open

function.comment:
/**
   * Closes the open TextExcerptToggle pane.
   * @function
   * @fires TextExcerptToggle#hide
   */
function.name: close

event.comment:
/**
     * Fires to close other open TextExcerptToggle, typically when TextExcerptToggle is opening
     * @event TextExcerptToggle#closeme
     */
event.description: Fires to close other open TextExcerptToggle, typically when TextExcerptToggle is opening
event.name: closeme

event.comment:
/**
     * Fires once the TextExcerptToggle is visible.
     * @event TextExcerptToggle#show
     */
event.description: Fires once the TextExcerptToggle is visible.
event.name: show

event.comment:
/**
     * Fires once the TextExcerptToggle is no longer visible.
     * @event TextExcerptToggle#hide
     */
event.description: Fires once the TextExcerptToggle is no longer visible.
event.name: hide

member.description: Class that designates bounding container of TextExcerptToggle (default: window)
member.name: parentClass

member.description: Amount of time to delay opening a submenu on hover event.
member.name: hoverDelay

member.description: Allow submenus to open on hover events
member.name: hover

member.description: Don't close TextExcerptToggle when hovering over TextExcerptToggle pane
member.name: hoverPane

member.description: Number of pixels between the TextExcerptToggle pane and the triggering element on open.
member.name: vOffset

member.description: Number of pixels between the TextExcerptToggle pane and the triggering element on open.
member.name: hOffset

member.description: Class applied to adjust open position. JS will test and fill this in.
member.name: positionClass

member.description: Allow the plugin to trap focus to the TextExcerptToggle pane if opened with keyboard commands.
member.name: trapFocus

member.description: Allow the plugin to set focus to the first focusable element within the pane, regardless of method of opening.
member.name: autoFocus

member.description: Allows a click on the body to close the TextExcerptToggle.
member.name: closeOnClick

__fm.description: an inline text paragraph, toggling to excerpt or full length
__fm.title: molecule/text-excerpt-toggle
